author: Buddha
phrase: The mind is everything. What you think, you become.

author: Rumi
phrase: Love is the bridge between you and everything.

author: Quetzalcoatl
phrase: The greatest treasure is found within oneself.

author: Mahatma Gandhi
phrase: Be the change you wish to see in the world.

author: Lao Tzu
phrase: The journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.

author: Guru Nanak
phrase: Realization of Truth is higher than all else. Higher still is truthful living.

author: Paramahansa Yogananda
phrase: Divine love is without condition, without boundary, without change.

author: Sri Ramakrishna
phrase: God can be realized through all paths. All religions are true.

author: Swami Vivekananda
phrase: Arise, awake, and stop not until the goal is reached.

author: Jalal ad-Din Muhammad Rumi
phrase: You were born with wings, why prefer to crawl through life?

author: Thich Nhat Hanh
phrase: Breathing in, I calm body and mind. Breathing out, I smile.

author: Paramahansa Yogananda
phrase: Be as simple as you can be; you will be astonished to see how uncomplicated and happy your life can become.

author: Ramana Maharshi
phrase: Your own self-realization is the greatest service you can render the world.

author: Guru Nanak
phrase: He who has no faith in himself can never have faith in God.

author: Eckhart Tolle
phrase: Realize deeply that the present moment is all you ever have.

author: Rumi
phrase: Stop acting so small. You are the universe in ecstatic motion.

author: Buddha
phrase: Peace comes from within. Do not seek it without.
